text: Daisy Lúcidi (10 August 1929 - 7 May 2020) was a Brazilian actress. She was born in Rio de Janeiro. Her best known role was as Valentina Miranda in the telenovela Passione. She also starred in Paraíso Tropical and Babilônia. Her best known movie role was as Elder Isaura in As Aventuras de Agamenon, o Repórter (2012). On 4 May 2020, Lúcidi was hospitalized for COVID-19 in Rio de Janeiro.ATRIZ DAISY LÚCIDI ESTÁ INTERNADA EM ESTADO GRAVE APÓS TER TESTADO POSITIVO PARA O CORONAVÍRUS She died three days later on 7 May from the infection, aged 90.Atriz e radialista Daisy Lúcidi morre de Covid-19 no Rio ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Rio de Janeiro Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian television actors Category:Brazilian stage actors Category:Brazilian voice actors Category:Radio actors Category:Actors from Rio de Janeiro
title: Daisy Lúcidi
